name: Windward Shoals
role_in_state: Strategic pilotage hub and reef-reagent supplier
economy_niches: reef-harvested ritual reagents (coral resins, sponge salts)
light shipbuilding and repair (reefal craft, pilot skiffs)
culture_adjustments: Tide-calendar dominates daily law and work rhythms beyond state norm
Guild-led pilot families hold quasi-legal authority over waters
Stronger oral rites for lost mariners and reef-memorial liturgies
Taboos against certain reef harvests during spawning tides
Practical seamanship idioms infuse Coastal Tongues speech locally
constraints: Ritual magic here consumes scarce imported reagents
Navigational auguries supplement but do not replace charts/pilots
Combustion industry limited by lack of heavy steam tech
notes: Key pilotage chokepoints confer strategic leverage to local guilds
Produces reagents critical to state coastal rituals
Seasonal festivals timed to spring tides draw visiting merchants
